products.name: Magic Sleigh

products.description: Green and red hat with a jingling bell — perfect for festive productivity.

products.name: Reindeer Feed Mix
products.description: Premium blend of oats, starlight, and holiday cheer for elite reindeer.

products.name: North Pole GPS Beacon
products.description: Never get lost in a snowstorm again — find your way back to the workshop!

products.name: Gift Wrapping Kit
products.description: Everything you need to wrap presents with perfect festive flair.

products.name: Hot Cocoa Bombs
products.description: Explosive chocolate experience that melts into the creamiest cocoa.

products.name: Reindeer Jetpack System
products.description: For when the reindeer are tired. strap these on for Mach 2 delivery speeds. Helmet required.

products.name: Tactical Santa Suit (Kevlar)
products.description: Chimney-proof, dog-bite-proof, and fire-resistant. Look festive while staying safe in the danger zone.

products.name: Liquid Christmas Spirit (100% Pure)
products.description: Highly unstable energy drink. One sip keeps an Elf working for 72 hours straight. Do not mix with sugar.

products.name: A.I. Naughty-or-Nice Scanner
products.description: Uses deep learning algorithms to judge children's souls with 99.9% accuracy. No appeal process.

products.name: Nuclear-Powered Snow Globe
products.description: Shake it once, it snows for 1000 years. Glows in the dark due to mild radiation. Do not break glass.

products.name: Instant Chimney Lube (Industrial)
products.description: Frictionless nanotech gel. Slide down even the tightest pipes without getting stuck. Wash hands after use.
